scripts.build: npm install enhanced-resolve@3.3.0 && npm run prod-build
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist tmp && npm cache clean
scripts.prepare-electron: mkdirp ./tmp/web && ncp build-assets/desktop tmp && ncp dist/web tmp/web
scripts.build-desktop: npm run build && npm run prepare-electron && electron-packager ./tmp/ --all --asar --electron-version=1.4.15 --icon="build-assets/resources/icon" --out=./dist/desktop/
scripts.prepare-mobile: mkdirp dist/mobile/www && ncp dist/web dist/mobile/www && ncp build-assets/mobile dist/mobile
scripts.build-mobile: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare &&  cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile-ios: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios && cordova build ios && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile-android: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android && cordova build android && cd ../..
scripts.start-mobile-android: cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && cordova run android && cd ../..
scripts.start-mobile-ios: cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && cordova emulate ios && cd ../..
